name: A Short Quest for Power
description:
This game was made for the Go Godot 2 game jam with the theme of power source.  It's a short 2d action platformer culminating in a boss fight. You play as a little blue spirit trying to find power by killing a stone totem.  

Note: 1 update, literally just added music

Controls:

  • Movement: WASD(also angle sword swings)
  • Dash:Shift
  • Jump:Space
  • Swing:K or left click
  • Heal:K,E
  • Pause:Esc

Music Attributions:

"Peril" by Xylo-Ziko / CC BY-NC

"Majestic Energy.mp3" by Almusic34 / CC BY 4.0

Credits:

Sfx by KennyNl

I used the upheaval font by Ænigma from Dafont.
